Posts.Content: May 15, 2008 01:07PM jb123 wrote: Thanks beachmom. My mom will see her onc soon. I now really think she has "tooth abscess" because she has ALL the symptoms and could explain the lymph node by the jaw...hopefully thats why. :)
Posts.Title: Terrified about my mom... jb123 jb123

Posts.Content: jb123 wrote: Hello, My mom has been diagnosed with bc that have spread to lymph nodes under her arm and around the breast area in Jan '08. Not sure exactly what stage..She started out with neoadjuvant chemo of taxol and something else and finished her 4th dose recently. However, she has noticed a swollen lymph node by her ear right after a 5 hour flight(which idk if it had anything to do w it).... This is freaking me out. My question is, can bc still spread even though you are on high dose chemo sessions? I'm really worried and too impatient to wait for her to get tested... Thanks ladies. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Terrified about my mom... jb123 jb123
